sentences.en: ...the bombastic style adopted by his predecessor.
Answer: actually, that is not scientific and realistic and kind of bombastic.
sentences.cn: 回答: 事实上, 这是不科学的,不实际的,有点夸张.

sentences.en: I went on, using the characteristically bombastic language of the time.
sentences.cn: 我使用当时流行的夸大其词的语言接着说.

sentences.en: The candidate spoke in a bombastic way of all that he would do if elected.
sentences.cn: 候选人大肆吹嘘,一旦他当选将要如何如何.

sentences.en: The orator spoke in a bombastic manner.
sentences.cn: 这位演说家的讲话言过其实.

sentences.en: Tom's increase in importance did not lead him to bombastic speeches at the party.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的荣升并未导致他在聚会上夸夸其谈.

words.tran_cn: 夸大地；浮华地；言过其实地；矫揉造作地

trans.tran_cn: 夸夸其谈的，空洞的，唐，虚夸
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as bombastic, you are criticizing them for trying to impress other people by saying things that sound impressive but have little meaning
